titles.title: To amend the Jobs and Growth Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2003 to make permanent the treatment of dividend income as capital gains.
To amend the Jobs and Growth Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2003 to make permanent the treatment of dividend income as capital gains.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Jobs Growth and Reconciliation Act of 2003 to repeal the sunset on the provision providing for the treatment of dividend income as capital gains.
